# harness_autostopping_alert (Data Source)

Data source for retrieving a Harness AutoStopping alert by ID. Use the id (identifier) returned by the API when the alert was created.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `events` (List of String) List of event types that trigger the alert.
- `name` (String) Name of the alert.
- `recipients` (Block List, Min: 1, Max: 1) Notification recipients (email and/or slack). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--recipients))

### Optional

- `applicable_to_all_rules` (Boolean) When true, the alert applies to all AutoStopping rules in the account (leave `rule_id_list` empty). Mutually exclusive with `rule_id_list`.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the alert is enabled.
- `rule_id_list` (List of Number) List of AutoStopping rule IDs to apply the alert to. Required when `applicable_to_all_rules` is false. Mutually exclusive with `applicable_to_all_rules` = true.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `identifier` (String) Unique identifier of the alert.

<a id="nestedblock--recipients"></a>
### Nested Schema for `recipients`

Optional:

- `email` (List of String) List of email addresses.
- `slack` (List of String) List of Slack webhook URLs or channel identifiers.
